question: Which newest paper about fine-tuning strategies does this paper(titled "ICU: Conquering Language Barriers in Vision-and-Language Modeling by Dividing the Tasks into Image Captioning and Language Understanding") mention in the troduction? What is the originality of this paper(I mean the paper mentioned in the "ICU" paper) compared to previous works?
answer_format: Your answer should be a single python list, the first element is the string of the paper name, the second element is a string of the originality of this paper.
reasoning_steps: First, go to the introduction in the anchor paper to identify the newest paper about fine-tuning strategies.
Second, find the full name of this paper and turn to it.
Finally, read relevent section of the paper to find its originality.

gold: Delving Deeper into Cross-lingual Visual Question Answering

eval_kwargs_list.reference_answer: This paper is the first to provide a comprehensive analysis of multilingual VQA, with a focus on cross-lingual transfer.
eval_kwargs_list.question: What is the originality of this paper compared to previous works?
